channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Here’s A List Of Unique, Made-In-America Gifts From Each State
item.description: The American Dream – that if you work hard, anyone can get ahead— is fulfilled by the risk takers who start businesses.

item.title: 10 Tips To Keep Smartphones From Making Your Kids Tired, Fat, And Miserable
item.description: A new study serves as a sobering warning to parents to avoid giving smartphones to their kids until absolutely necessary.

item.title: New Docs Reveal Jack Smith Intentionally Violated Congressional Republicans’ Constitutional Rights
item.description: Smith never should have approved the subpoenas since they violated the congressional Republicans’ clearly established rights.

item.title: No, Trump Is Not to Blame for the National Guard Shooting
item.description: The reaction in the media to this attack is as predictable as it is revolting.

item.title: Wisconsin’s Lib-Led Supreme Court Stacks The Congressional Map Deck
item.description: The latest leftist gerrymander stunt should serve as a reminder to Republicans that failure to rewrite representation lines is not an option.

item.title: Appeals Court: Alina Habba May Not Serve as De Facto U.S. Attorney
item.description: Trump and Bondi’s finagling with the appointment process has gotten them nowhere.

item.title: Indiana House GOP's new congressional maps would likely knock out all Democrats
item.description: Republicans in the Indiana House have rolled out proposed changes to their congressional maps that could net them two new seats in the U.S. House of R...

item.title: In Defense of Strip Malls
item.description: If these commercial establishments offend your taste, don’t shop in them.

item.title: Chairman of vaccine committee leaves for new HHS job
item.description: U.S. Health Secretary Robert F. Kennedy Jr. has replaced the head of his controversial vaccine advisory committee, federal officials announced Monday.

item.title: 'Batons are never passed, they're taken': A far-left youth movement eyes Democrats' senior leaders
item.description: Left-wing activists see growing ranks of young Democrats disenchanted with the party's older leaders, who they say aren't solving the country's proble...

item.title: Make the Case for Regime-Change War in Venezuela
item.description: Trump should present to the voters and Congress his case for war without euphemism or evasion.

item.title: Claims Afghans Were ‘Vetted’ Contradict Federal Investigations And Common Sense
item.description: The process by which the Biden administration ushered Afghans into the United States barely resembles 'vetting' at all.

item.title: TSA to charge $45 fee for airline passengers who lack Real ID
item.description: The Transportation Security Administration announced a new $45 fee to temporarily verify identities of airline passengers who lack a Real ID, starting...

item.title: Rethinking Immigration
item.description: It is past time that we adopted hard-headed immigrant policies that, yes, put America first.

item.title: Conservatives ahead of governing party in Honduras presidential vote, early results show
item.description: Two conservative challengers were practically tied for the lead in Honduras' presidential contest with votes from about 55% of polling places counted ...
